name: The Brink of Existence
description:
This is a game I've created for the Ink game jam. First time using Godot and the InkGD addon. I tried to create a game which explores, in a very fictional  way, the idea of AI and how what we use to train AI may result in machines that have a better understanding of life then we expect. I think when we do create the "Sci-Fi" version of Artificial Intelligence, it will be by mistake. I just hope it's a good mistake. 

I tried to make an online version of the game, however I had some issues, so instead I'm releasing it as an executable file. I did enjoy creating the story, I hope I can make a version online in the near future. 

Music
